entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
